Yep very interesting they used the word justice, ok definitely will have to=
 ask more troopers questions LOL without=C2=A0 telling them all why exactly=
 I am curious. I will let ya know if I find out anything new.
=C2=A0
Misty
=
=C2=A0

--- On Mon, 5/11/09, Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@...> wrot=
e:


From: Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@...>
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC]=
 The Seven - interesting tidbit of info
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: M=
onday, May 11, 2009, 3:21 AM










I love the synchronicity of it all!=
=C2=A0 Seven and I have a great relationship LOL!=C2=A0 Seven comes through=
 to me all the time like this (WE ARE SEVEN) and so I asked what Seven mean=
t to them..=C2=A0 Here is the reply I got which I gotta admit was pretty co=
ol:
=C2=A0
WITH CHRIST =E2=80=93 FAITH =E2=80=93 THE 1ST SON =E2=80=93 SHIV=
A JUSTICE =E2=80=93 THE SPIRIT =E2=80=93 THAT=E2=80=99S ALL
=C2=A0
k
=C2=A0=





From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com ] On =
Behalf Of Misty Dawn
Sent: Monday, May 11, 2009 1:37 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups .com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The Seven - interesting tidbit of info
=C2=
=A0












Gets weirder. Even stranger none of the police scanner code=
s I can find online so far seem to follow along with thier callout codes fo=
r seven. Not sure if its something new they implemented or what I will ask =
when I get a chance. The trooper I was talking to has been on the force qui=
te a few years but I know they have been implementing some changes on how t=
hey do things just not sure if thats one of them.

=C2=A0

Misty

--- On Mo=
n, 5/11/09, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@ yahoo.com> wrote:


From: Misty Dawn <=
bulletbabea@ yahoo.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The Seven - interesting tidb=
it of info
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Monday, May 11, 2009, 2:28 AM=









Yeah I hadnt heard of it until today. I just looked at him and sai=
d glad hes alive and thanks for the info I find the 7 thing interesting.

=
=C2=A0

Ive had spirits say they were seven before when I asked what it was=
 they always lead me to the conclusion it was a label for the group speakin=
g this info just made me go hmmm then wow once it sunk in. Interesting sync=
hronicity anyway.

=C2=A0

Misty

--- On Mon, 5/11/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zac=
k@gmail. com> wrote:


From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com>
Subject: Re:=
 [EVP-ITC] The Seven - interesting tidbit of info
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .=
com
Date: Monday, May 11, 2009, 2:04 AM




I guess police still use those =
codes. Emergency agencies such as ESDA now follow the FEMA Incident Command=
 System/National Incident Management System=C2=A0which requires all=C2=A0co=
mmunications to be in plain English (no codes).

Zack


=C2=A0

On Sun, May=
 10, 2009 at 11:31 PM, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@ yahoo.com> wrote:




=C2=
=A0






Tonight at work I was talking to a state trooper, there had been =
an accident. I asked him if there were any deaths (it was very very bad) an=
d he said he didnt know so he got on his radio and called in and asked them=
 if it was a 7 at the site. They told him negative, and he told me the litt=
le boy who was the worst off was still alive. I asked him why did you ask t=
hem if it was a 7. He said code 7, I was asking them if they were dead. So =
if you ever hear anyone call 7 over the radio that means someones dead.

=
=C2=A0

Just thought I would pass that on. I find it interesting since I kn=
ow alot of us have heard this before when used to describe who is speaking =
rather than a name they say seven.

=C2=A0

Misty
=C2=A0
=C2=A0

=C2=A0



=
